flawed_nl_solution:
He buys 2*5=<<2*5=10>>10 drinks for his friends
So he orders 10+6=<<10+6=61>>61 total drinks.
The cost of the drinks was 61*6=$<<61*6=366>>366
So his order came out to 366+14=$<<366+14=380>>380
The tip came out to 380*0.3=$<<380*0.3=114>>114
So his order cost 380+114=$<<380+114=494>>494
Adding in the cover charge means it cost 494+20=$<<494+20=514>>514

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 16, not 61. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
